answerText: Lord Rayleigh [accept John William Strutt; accept 3rd Baron Rayleigh][10] The Plateau-Rayleigh instability is caused by this property, the ability of the surface of a liquid to withstand external forces.  It allows a water strider to walk on water.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 6 | 19 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: With Plateau, this scientist names an instability that causes a stream of liquid to break up into droplets in order to minimize surface area. For 10 points each: [10] Name this scientist who also names an instability at the boundary between two immiscible fluids of different density that causes one fluid to accelerate another.
